vote.text: Amendment SA 3138 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3138 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S12449; text: CR S12449) Of a technical nature.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3138 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
